modName: Horndew Lodge Map Marker for Falskaar
summary:
Shouldn't Horndew Lodge have a map marker like every other player house in Skyrim?
*Adds a map marker for the player home in Falskaar, Horndew Lodge.
REQUIRES FALSKAAR by AlexanderJVelicky: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?
descriptionHtml:
Shouldn't Horndew Lodge have a map marker like every other player house in Skyrim?

*Adds a map marker for the player home in Falskaar, Horndew Lodge.

REQUIRES FALSKAAR by AlexanderJVelicky: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?[/url]

The map marker icon for Horndew Lodge matches the ones used by a few other mods for vanilla homes, such as:

Vanilla Skyrim -- House Map Markers by Smakit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8348/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8348/?[/url]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7440

Dragonborn/Solstheim -- Severin Manor Map Marker by KahjiitRaj
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32993/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32993/?
[/url]
I'd also recommend this mod -- Island Fast Travel by Shrike
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38465/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38465/?[/url]

The colored icons in my screenshot are from another mod.
You can find a few mods which color your map markers. One is Colored Map Markers by MisterPete Forsaken32 Mardoxx
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19023/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19023/?[/url]
author: Dinobabbler
